comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I'm going to the project update meeting at noon so I guess that rules me out. I'm beginning to get a bit of a winter paunch from my recent inactivity so I'm going to have to get on it again soon. Maybe next week?

comments.author: Rob
comments.body: Sorry, lengthy discussions at Polycom headquarters kept me from making it back to campus in time. Will be heading out on my own...
